name: Guardian365Pro
0:
”Alexa， show the front camera”
”Alexa, show the living room camera”
”Alexa, stop the front camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Enable the Guardian 365 Pro Skill in your Alexa App, and you can check-in on your property by simply saying “Alexa, show the front door.”

 Please note that you are only able to view activity and listen to audio from your Guardian 365 Pro Security Camera; you will not 

be able to speak to people through your Echo Show. Also, the original Easy4IP Cameras are not supported at this time. 

 To get started, simply tap the “Enable” button, link your Alexa account to your Guardian 365 Pro account.After linking your Guardian 365 Pro account and discovering your Guardian 365 Pro cameras in your Alexa account, you can start streaming live video to your Echo Show with commands like:
 - "Alexa, show the front camera"
 - "Alexa, show the living room camera "

To stop your Guardian 365 Pro camera from streaming video, you can say:
- "Alexa, stop the front camera"

 When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. The name is equivalent to the device name of 

your camera and can be found and configured in the Guardian 365 Pro app. You can also add Guardian 365 Pro cameras to new or existing groups in the Alexa app。
